verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even <S%H6153><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> into the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month: <S%H2320><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh; <S%H6946><s%> and Miriam <S%H4813><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And there was no <S%H3808><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation: <S%H5712><s%> and they gathered <S%H6950><s%> themselves together against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> strived <S%H7378><s%> with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and spoke, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Would <S%H3863><s%> God that we had died <S%H1478><s%> when our brothers <S%H251><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD! <S%H3068><s%>

And why <S%H4100><s%> have you brought <S%H935><s%> up the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that we and our cattle <S%H1165><s%> should die <S%H4191><s%> there? <S%H8033><s%>

And why <S%H4100><s%> have you made us to come <S%H5927><s%> up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> us in to this <S%H2088><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> place? <S%H4725><s%> it is no <S%H3808><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> of seed, <S%H2233><s%> or of figs, <S%H8384><s%> or of vines, <S%H1612><s%> or of pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> is there any water <S%H4325><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and they fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces: <S%H6440><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to them.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> the rod, <S%H4294><s%> and gather <S%H6950><s%> you the assembly <S%H5712><s%> together, you, and Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> you to the rock <S%H5553><s%> before their eyes; <S%H5869><s%> and it shall give <S%H5414><s%> forth his water, <S%H4325><s%> and you shall bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to them water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock: <S%H5553><s%> so you shall give the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and their beasts <S%H1165><s%> drink. <S%H8248><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as he commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> together before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the rock, <S%H5553><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to them, Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> you rebels; <S%H4784><s%> must we fetch <S%H3318><s%> you water <S%H4325><s%> out of this <S%H2088><s%> rock? <S%H5553><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> lifted <S%H7311><s%> up his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with his rod <S%H4294><s%> he smote <S%H5221><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%> twice: <S%H6471><s%> and the water <S%H4325><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out abundantly, <S%H7227><s%> and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> drank, and their beasts <S%H1165><s%> also.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you believed <S%H539><s%> me not, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> me in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> you shall not bring <S%H935><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> congregation <S%H6951><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> them.

This <S%H1992><s%> is the water <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah; <S%H4809><s%> because <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he was sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> You know <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the travail <S%H8513><s%> that has befallen <S%H4672><s%> us:

How our fathers <S%H1><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and we have dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time; <S%H3117><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> vexed <S%H7489><s%> us, and our fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And when we cried <S%H6817><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice, <S%H6963><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> an angel, <S%H4397><s%> and has brought <S%H3318><s%> us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are in Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> of your border: <S%H1366><s%>

Let us pass, <S%H5674><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, through your country: <S%H776><s%> we will not pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fields, <S%H7704><s%> or through the vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will we drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the wells: <S%H875><s%> we will go <S%H3212><s%> by the king's <S%H4428><s%> high way, <S%H1870><s%> we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left, <S%H8040><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we have passed <S%H5674><s%> your borders. <S%H1366><s%>
And Edom <S%H123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, You shall not pass <S%H5674><s%> by me, lest I come <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> you with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, We will go <S%H5927><s%> by the high <S%H4546><s%> way: and if <S%H518><s%> I and my cattle <S%H4735><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of your water, <S%H4325><s%> then I will pay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H4377><s%> for it: I will only, <S%H7535><s%> without <S%H369><s%> doing anything <S%H1697><s%> else, go <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my feet. <S%H7272><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> You shall not go <S%H5674><s%> through. <S%H5674><s%> And Edom <S%H123><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> him with much <S%H3515><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Thus Edom <S%H123><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> passage <S%H5674><s%> through his border: <S%H1366><s%> why Israel <S%H3478><s%> turned <S%H5186><s%> away from him.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor. <S%H2023><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> by the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people: <S%H5971><s%> for he shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H4775><s%> my word <S%H6310><s%> at the water <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah. <S%H4809><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and bring <S%H5927><s%> them up to mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor: <S%H2023><s%>

And strip <S%H6584><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> of his garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> them on Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son: <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> and shall die <S%H4191><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded: <S%H6680><s%> and they went <S%H5927><s%> up into <S%H413><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stripped <S%H6584><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> of his garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> them on Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son; <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount: <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And when all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Aaron <S%H175><s%> was dead, <S%H1478><s%> they mourned <S%H1058><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
